I'm Joel

Recognize

An app that recognizes the faces in pictures and predicts it's location with a bounding box.

The front-end was built in react, it's backend utilizes an express server running on-top of node.js

It also boasts of a fully functional SQL database built with PostgreSQL

Friendz

A simple react and redux app that filters profiles based on search results.

It uses react for the UI, and redux for state management, so the state of the search box can be recorded at all times. The profiles structure are fetched from an API.

Dev Portfolio

An elegant portfolio template that dev and desing teams can utilize to quickly bootstrap theirs and make necessary changes.

It has a beautiful carousel that highlights the teams main strengths and skills.

It is built in vanilla js and is simple to set up.

Stealth Logistics

An elegant landing page for a logistics office, to help them get clients contact information and meeting schedule quickly

It uses an form that submits directly to an email account, for fast processing.

And with a click, potential clients can be redirected to a social page to learn more about the company

Survey form Page

An extensively detailed survery form template

A survey form that can be used to get valuable feedback from customers and stakeholders
